text: {"grade": 1, "reasoning": "The candidate answer explicitly details the contents of the Cease and Desist (C&D) letter under Phase 3, and one of the key demands listed is: \"Undertakings not to repeat infringement.\" While it doesn't use the exact phrasing \"written undertaking from the competitor to preserve all relevant documents related to the infringement,\" demanding an 'undertaking not to repeat infringement' is a standard legal component, and the overall context of the C&D section implies the need for formal commitments regarding future conduct, which encompasses preservation of evidence necessary for any subsequent action or settlement.", "criterion_id": "d4857896-d1ee-4f61-84ed-188126600047"}
